Text: Malestrom, I wanted to thank you for all of the downloads I have from you. My wife is now moving up into a multinational construction company..(she didn't ask, but)..I am downloading all of these architecture books for her. And yeah - I will seed and double yeah - I'll say hallelujah for your extra hard work! It's worth it when someone thanks you..I know!
Nice to hear about the moving up and yes it's a motivation my friend.Thank you.

Dear Malestrom

You are the best and most consistent source of quality books and mags

it is a great pity to hear you're having problems with tpb also...

what other sites , or how do I find out legitmate accounts?

cheers
a wholehearted fan
Completely brilliant.  Thank you so much for all your torrents, but a particularly huge thank you for the architecture .... amazing .... :-)
